snippet: Yoga clothing company, Lululemon, saw its shares fell nearly 13 percent in after-hours trading, after announcing its chief executive officer would step down as head of the company.
abstract: Yoga clothing company Lululemon announces that its chief executive Christine M Day will step down, prompting shares to fall nearly 13 percent; reports quarterly earnings of $47.3 million, or 32 cents a share, compared with $46.6 million, or 32 cents a share, year-ago period; net revenue increased 21 percent, to $345.8 million from $285.7 million.
lead_paragraph: Yoga clothing company, Lululemon, saw its shares fell nearly 13 percent in after-hours trading, after announcing its chief executive officer would step down as head of the company.

headline.seo: Lululemon Chief to Step Down; Shares Sink in After-Hours Trading
headline.main: Lululemon Shares Sink; Its Chief Will Step Down
headline.print_headline: Lululemon Shares Sink; Its Chief Will Step Down
